value:
What a splendid castle. Strong.
Stylish. Why, it's almost my equal in
fortitude and magnificence!

To get to the top, one need only be
willing to claw...and claw...and
glorious etcetera!

I've noticed how dutifully you patrol
this place on my behalf.$k$pYour devotion to me, Narcian, makes
you greater than every other flea
I see hopping before me!

Grraaah! Bwaah!$k$pEveryone else around here makes
me, Narcian, so SPITTING mad!
They refuse to bow down!

I, Narcian, have a weakness. If I pass
a mirror in battle, I'm so smitten with
my prowess that I cease battling.$k$pSo keep those mirrors OFF the
battlefield!

Well, well, well—you must be
$Nu.$k$pThe pleasure is entirely yours.

Behold the grandeur of me,
Narcian!

Another clawful of excellence on
my way to the top!

Turn away! Don't look upon it!
Who did this to Narcian?

It's only natural that you'd want
to pay tribute to me, Narcian.

I am Narcian—a Wyvern General of
Bern. Do you wish to kneel before me?
Or tremble in fear? Your choice.

I, Narcian, have a bone to pick
with you! I heard that you said I am
completely full of myself!$k$pDid you mean it as an insult?
Because it's not! I am full of
nothing BUT me!$k$pHow else would I have clawed my
way to the top? Confidence is king,
and I would be emperor!$k$pHmpf. You might be the first one
to ever stand there and say
such a thing to my face.$k$pI'll make you regret that you
picked a fight with me, Narcian!
One day I'll make you kneel.$k$pThen I'll pet your head like a little
kitty—and keep you at my side
forever! Ha ha ha ha!
はぁっ！
せぇやっ！
うああっ！
You... You...
Ha ha ha ha!
You will learn your place!
Yield? Never!
Grovel, worm!
By you—?!
Heehee...
What business have you with me?
Captivated by my style and grace? Well, of course you are.
My talents are legion. My abilities, unparalleled.
What glorious hair I have!
I am strong... I am clever...
I am handsome... I am righteous... And more than anyone else. Anywhere!
My philosophy of life...? Ah, simple. The weak must obey the powerful.
Very well?
Yes?
Watch this.
